description: '''Ella McMahon''' (born 1 April 1994), known professionally as '''Ella Eyre''', is an English singer and songwriter. She is known for her collaborations with [[Rudimental]] on their UK number-one single "[[Waiting All Night]]" (2013), which won the [[2014 Brit Awards|2014 Brit Award]] for British Single of the Year, with [[DJ Fresh]] on his single "[[Gravity (DJ Fresh song)|Gravity]]" (2015), and with [[Sigala]] on his singles "[[Came Here for Love]]" (2017) and "[[Just Got Paid (Sigala song)|Just Got Paid]]" (2018). Her debut EP, ''Deeper'', was released in 2013 and her debut album, ''[[Feline (Ella Eyre album)|Feline]]'', was released in 2015. Eyre's musical influences include [[Lauryn Hill]], [[Etta James]], [[Basement Jaxx]] and [[Hans Zimmer]].
